description:
My name is Urara. I`m the best Nightmare Eater of the Three Kingdoms. When I returned to the Yaoyorozudou after a long hiatus, I couldn`t find the owner, Makitarou anywhere...I see, I guess the store is now being run by this girl called Yuzu...But anyhow, I was quite surprised to see that such a lazy Cat God was living here.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 思い出ハレーションサマー
